entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Red Earth Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:00 p.m. MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 18.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Earth 6:00 PM MDT Monday 8 May 2023
Temperature: 18.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 36 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: NW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local smoke. Fog patches before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local smoke late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 22. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing late in the evening. Local smoke. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 8 May 2023
